mapper.select:
SELECT count(sb.id) FROM storagebin sb LEFT JOIN storagesection s ON sb.storageSectionCode = s.code LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON w.code = s.wareHouseCode
and sb.code like concat("%",#{code},"%")
and storageSectionCode like concat("%",#{storageSectionCode},"%")
and wareHouseCode like concat("%",#{wareHouseCode},"%")
and sb.status = #{status}
